name: Class SecureLookupSupplier
text:
Provides security-checked access to a MethodHandles.Lookup object.
 See getLookup() for details.

fields.description:
The name of a runtime permission required to successfully invoke the
 getLookup() method.

methods.description: Returns the lookup secured by this SecureLookupSupplier.

Returns the value of getLookup() without a security check. Can
 be used by subclasses to access the lookup quickly.
